summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 6, 2019. It details routine institutional operations, staff assignments, and inmate counts. Notably, it lists Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) as a new admission to the facility, which is significant as it documents his incarceration prior to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as a new admission to MCC New York under inmate number 76318-054.

events.title: Epstein Admission to MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was admitted to the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York as inmate #76318-054.

events.title: Daily Correctional Operations
events.description: Routine daily operations at MCC New York, including staff shortages leading to the vacating of housing units (10-South, SHU) and the transfer of an inmate.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was admitted to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on or before July 6, 2019, with inmate number 76318-054.
The report documents staff shortages on July 6, 2019, leading to the vacating of housing units 10-South and the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
An inmate was transferred from unit 'KN' to unit 'ZA' due to operational adjustments.
The report is a routine administrative log, providing a snapshot of the facility's population and operations shortly before Epstein's death.
The total inmate population at the beginning of the morning watch shift on July 6, 2019, was 789.
